text: It may be supreme, but it's still constrained by rules of its own.
The U.S.A.'s number one hero-Star and Stripe. The government strictly oversees her Quirk.
The particulars of how it works are highly classified (though the public gets the gist based on her visible heroics).
A jaw-dropping, unreasonable power that makes the world her plaything, and one that practically redefines what a Quirk can be.
She touches a target, says its name, and assigns her rule of choice.
But I've learned quite a bit from our battle so far.
Now I get how New Order works.
